Dialogue.Page: The view from here is incredible! That star is magnificent!
And this moon has such beautiful peaks and valleys!
None of the moons back home have life on them, I wonder if it's because it's so close to the planet below?
Maybe it picked up its atmosphere from the planet after some ancient collision?
The air here is technically breathable, but it's so thin...
Yep, I'll keep my spacesuit on.
